p: In the adults' networks, cnn.com places first, inconsistent with other groups' networks. Twitter ranks second, and official domains take from third to fifth. For example, cdc.gov, which is the Centres for Disease Control and Prevention of the United States, ranks third. co.uk and org.uk place fourth and fifth, respectively. In the elderly's networks, twitter.com places first, followed by weforum.org, cbc.ca, co.uk, and youtube.com. weforum.org is the world economic forum that engages the foremost political, business, cultural and other leaders of society to shape global, regional and industry agendas. Cbc.ca is the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation that serves as the national public broadcaster for both radio and television.
